See full description Product Information Herbal medicine has been around for thousands of years and has effectively treated a great many people. In recent times allopathic pharmaceutical medications have taken over and in the process many of the traditional herbal remedies have fallen by the wayside. However, pharmaceutical medicine often falls short in delivering relief for many ailments, whereas herbal medicine often succeeds where allopathic medications fail In this book, herbal treatments for many conditions are covered, which includes: Anxiety Allergy Cold and flu Headaches Stomach problems Nausea Acne and skin Arthritis High blood pressure Diabetes Menopause Also in this lengthy and extensive guide, 36 great herbs for health are included, with their actions, interactions and contraindications outlined in detail, as well as the various ways in which you can take them. The herbs for health and wellbeing covered in this book include: KAVA KAVA AND FEVERFEW EUCALYPTUS OIL APPLE CIDER VINEGAR PEPPERMINT LEMON CLOVES CUMIN FENNEL BAKING SODA TEA TREE OIL AVOCADO SOYBEAN UNSAPONIFIABLES (ASU) BLACK CURRANT OIL (RIBES NIGRUM) CINNAMON SERPENTINE ALOE VERA BILBERRY EXTRACT FENUGREEK BLACK COHOSH SOY Also, this practical guide provides two appendixes; an appendix, which allow for quick reference to see the various herbal recipes and also an appendix with outlines the benefits of each herb, in a very handy list based table Read this extensive guide to medicinal herbs, if you want to provide yourself with an extra resource for dealing with a great many health conditions Product Identifiers Publisher CreateSpace ISBN-10 1537601245 ISBN-13 9781537601243 eBay Product ID (ePID) 234266884 Product Key Features Book Title Herbal Medicine : a Beginners Guide to Herbal Remedies for Health and Wellbeing Author Dermot Farrell Format Trade Paperback Language English Topic Herbal Medications Publication Year 2016 Genre Health & Fitness Number of Pages 160 Pages Dimensions Item Length 9in.
